course.description: Course ID(s) or "current" for current course

quiz.description: Quiz ID(s) or "current" for current quiz

user.description: User ID or "current" for current user

certificate_group_id.description: Certificate group ID  - works for group certificates only.

certificate_group_title.description: Displays the group's title  - works for group certificates only

certificate_group_url.description: Displays the group's URL - works for group certificates only

certificate_group_price_type.description: Displays the group's Access Mode - works for group certificates only

certificate_group_price.description: Displays the group's price - works for group certificates only

certificate_group_courses_count.description: Displays the number of courses in the group - works for group certificates only

certificate_group_user_group_status.description: Displays the group progress status of the user - works for group certificates only

certificate_group_enrolled_on.description: Displays the date the user enrolled into the group - works for group certificates only

certificate_group_completed_on.description: Displays the date the user completed all courses assigned to the group - works for group certificates only

certificate_group_percent_completed.description: Displays the score achieved in the group\â€™s courses - works for group certificates only

certificate_group_cert_url.description: Group certificate url for specified/current user

certificate_course_id.description: Certificate course ID  - works for course certificates only.

certificate_course_title.description: Displays the course title - works for course certificates only.

certificate_course_price.description: Displays the course price (only for one-time payment courses) - works for course certificates only.

certificate_course_price_type.description: Displays the Access Mode for the given course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_course_url.description: Displays the course URL - works for course certificates only.

certificate_course_points.description: Displays the total available points for the course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_user_course_points.description: Displays the amount of points the user earned for the course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_enrolled_on.description: Displays the course enrollment date (this does not apply to OPEN courses) - works for course certificates only.

certificate_completed_on.description: Displays the date the course was completed - works for course certificates only.

certificate_user_course_time.description: Displays the total time spent on a course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_cumulative_score.description: Displays the average score for all graded parts of the course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_cumulative_points.description: Displays the average points earned - works for course certificates only.

certificate_cumulative_total_points.description: Displays the average points earned - works for course certificates only.

certificate_cumulative_percentage.description: Displays the average percentage of all quizzes taken in the course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_cumulative_timespent.description: Displays the average time spent on each part of the course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_aggregate_score.description: Displays the final score received for the course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_aggregate_points.description: Displays the total points earned for the course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_aggregate_total_points.description: Displays the total points earned for the course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_aggregate_percentage.description: Displays the total percentage score for all quizzes taken as part of the course - works for course certificates only.

certificate_aggregate_timespent.description: Displays the total time spent on quizzes for the course as a whole - works for course certificates only.

certificate_course_cert_url.description: Course certificate url for specified/current user

certificate_quiz_id.description: Certificate quiz ID  - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_score.description: Displays the score received for that quiz - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_count.description: Displays the number of questions within the quiz - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_pass.description: Displays the score required in order to pass the quiz - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_pro_quizid.description: Displays quiz pro id that quiz - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_course_title.description: Displays the name of the course that the quiz is associated with - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_course_id.description: Displays course id that quiz  - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_lesson_id.description: Displays lesson id that quiz  - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_topic_id.description: Displays topic id that quiz  - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_timestamp.description: Displays the day/time when the quiz was completed - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_points.description: Displays the points received by the user on the quiz - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_total_points.description: Displays the total possible points that can be received for a given attempt - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_percentage.description: Displays the percentage grade received by the user on the quiz - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_title.description: Displays the name of the quiz - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_timespent.description: Displays the time spent taking the quiz - works for quiz certificates only.

certificate_quiz_cert_url.description: Quiz certificate url for specified/current user

certificate_user_display_name.description: Displays a user's full display name.
